title: Ticket #3259: condor_schedd can EXCEPT when acting on SUSPEND_JOBS
description:
Found by Red Hat QE Daniel Horak. 

$ echo queue | condor_submit -a universe=local -a cmd=/bin/sleep -a args=1d
1 job(s) submitted to cluster 1.
$ echo queue | condor_submit -a universe=scheduler -a cmd=/bin/sleep -a args=1d
1 job(s) submitted to cluster 2.
$ condor_suspend 1 or 2

condor_schedd will have EXCEPTd. Find, 

ERROR "unknown action (8 Suspend) in abort_job_myself()" at line 1870 in file .../src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp

or 

ERROR "bad action (8 Suspend) in abort_job_myself()" at line 2094 in file .../src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp

in LOG/ScheddLog.

Suspend is not supported for the Local or Scheduler universe.

The condor_schedd MUST NOT exit from these interactions.

condor_suspend SHOULD report an error.
remarks:
2012-Oct-25 17:52:16 by johnkn:
Bulk change of target version from v070806 to v070807 using ./ticket-target-mover.
